thread.title: Israel asks UN to reject Palestinian attempt to raise flag
thread.title_full: Israel asks UN to reject Palestinian attempt to raise flag | News24

author: news24.com
title: Israel asks UN to reject Palestinian attempt to raise flag
text:
New York - Israel on Tuesday urged the United Nations leaders to reject a Palestinian attempt to raise their flag at the UN headquarters as early as this month's gathering of world leaders there.
Israel's UN Ambassador Ron Prosor accused the Palestinians in letters to the UN secretary general and General Assembly president of "attempting to swiftly change longstanding UN tradition in order to score political points".
The flags of all 193 UN member states fly outside the UN headquarters in New York and other UN offices â€” but not the flags of the two non-member observer states, Palestine and the Vatican.
The Palestinians are seeking General Assembly approval of a draft resolution that would allow non-member observer states to raise their flags.
